text:
@seanhannity @LindseyGrahamSC @AlexBerenson @DrOz @marklevinshow @KarlRove Everyone who has a relative that dies from COVID-19 should sue FOX FAKE NEWS and every single one of it's Trump mouthpieces that downplayed this virus.  

Video evidence is a powerful thing.  WANTON AND WILLFUL NEGLIGENCE is a good place to start.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Dr. Oz Show
entity.description: After five years as a health expert on "The Oprah Winfrey Show," Dr. Mehmet Oz gets an hour of his own each weekday to discuss viewers' health-and-wellness concerns. No subject is off-limits, as Dr. Oz addresses viewers' questions and talks to health experts about any and all topics, from sex to diet and exercise to diseases and ways to avoid them.
